mapper.insert: insert into feed_comment set user_id = #{userId}, feed_id = #{feedId}, comment = #{comment}
mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id AS writerUserId, feed_comment_id as feedCommentId, comment, if(nick_name is null , uid, nick_name) as writerNm, pic as writerPic FROM feed_comment A join user B on a.user_id = b.user_id WHERE feed_id = #{feedId} ORDER BY feed_comment_id DESC LIMIT #{sIdx}, #{size}
